code-runner.executorMap.java: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$fileDir = '$dir'; $fileName = '$fileName'; $fileBaseName = '$fileNameWithoutExt'; $current = $fileDir; while ($current -and (Split-Path $current -Leaf) -ne 'src') { $parent = Split-Path $current -Parent; if ($parent -eq $current) { break }; $current = $parent }; $srcDir = if ((Split-Path $current -Leaf) -eq 'src') { $current } else { Split-Path $fileDir -Parent }; $pkgPath = $fileDir.Replace($srcDir, '').TrimStart('\\', '/').Replace('\\', '/'); $pkgName = $pkgPath.Replace('/', '.'); Set-Location $srcDir; javac "$pkgPath/$fileName"; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { java "$pkgName.$fileBaseName" }"
